directions: Combine water, lentils, onion, garlic, sugar, salt, curry powder, turmeric, and ginger root in slow cooker.
Cook on High for 5 hours. Stir cream into lentils until warmed through.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons curry powder, or more to taste
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, chopped
title: Slow Cooker Mild Curry Split Black Lentils
